name: Kikuichimonji Norimune
ability: Sharply increases DMG dealt when another of Okita's Favorite Swords is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the supposedly favored swords of Okita Soji. As she remembers being his favorite, she shows single-minded devotion to him. However, the details of her existence are unclear, so she can't clearly remember how to fight. She's clearly not able to exert her full power, but nonetheless she's proud of what strength she has.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 19/10/16 to 09/11/16
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 06/11/16 - 09/11/16
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points by 25% during the "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" event.
◦ Summon rate increased until 19/10/16 to 09/11/16

main: "Um... What's the proper way to hold a blade again?"
skill: "I can be of use, I swear!"
summon: "I...I guess I'll just go for it!"
